website_summaries.verdict: Gain is well-known for its pleasant smelling detergent formulas, this option is no exception.
pros: Smells great and rinses off well
The detergent cleanses as advertised, according to reviewers
Most buyers purchased this Gain formula because of the scent
cons: Random reports of product package leaking

customer_reviews.title: My favorite washing powder and it’s wonderful and I don’t have to lug it home
customer_reviews.text: Love the product I don’t have to drag it from the store to home it comes to my house work got a deal could that be nothing but good good good good
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Grant

customer_reviews.title: Like this; have purchased at Wal-Mart and Target but ...
customer_reviews.text: Like this; have purchased at Wal-Mart and Target but haven't found one this size in the stores. Will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Saab B.

customer_reviews.title: Seriously dissatisfied customer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not about the actual product. I really like this product. Gain is the one and only detergent that I use. This complaint is about the fact that this product was NEVER DELIVERED!! I've sent multiple emails to no success.
customer_reviews.author: Kecia Gellizeau

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I was using regular detergent. And my clothes kept getting soap globs and funny gook all on them when washing them. I didn't know why. I found out that I had a high efficiency washer, which requires high efficency detergent. So I bought this product because I love the way GAIN smells. And my clothes are extremely clean now, since the very first wash after switching to it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Came with a broken cap and spilled in box. No notice of this , even though it was taped back on.
customer_reviews.author: Dyrek87

customer_reviews.title: perfect detergent, too expensive though
customer_reviews.text: i love this detergent, but i bought it out of desperation because its my favorite. it is too expensive here.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Black

customer_reviews.title: I like gain products
customer_reviews.text: My clothes smell very nice after using it and the smell last long. I would recommend it to others and I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Racy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: this is my laundry detergent. Love the way it cleans and makes clothes smell.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Damage product.
customer_reviews.text: When I got product was damage and leaking plus box was resealed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loads of Washing clothes
customer_reviews.text: I love Gain Detergent in many ways because i use it to clean my family's clothes. Overall i'm happy with the purchase due to the quantity of detergent but it took a little bit longer to get shipped out to me in time.
customer_reviews.author: Martine

customer_reviews.title: Love the value for my money
customer_reviews.text: Love the fresh smell a good value for the will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: and the cleaning of Gain. Used it before, continue to use it and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: William Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Terrific laundry soap. Love it and will be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C

customer_reviews.title: Great product but smell doesn’t stay too long
customer_reviews.text: Smells good but the smell is not really present .
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: NOT GATORADE
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS THINKING IT WAS GREEN FLAVOR GATORADE BUT IT WAS SO NASTY.
customer_reviews.author: W. Foulke

customer_reviews.title: Not that great a value.
customer_reviews.text: Did not have the measuring cup attached as shown in the picture so I will have to use another cup to measure how much I'm removing each time.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Woods

customer_reviews.title: Putex
customer_reviews.text: It seems a bit watery for the amount instructions recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Caroll Dohner

customer_reviews.title: Lasted my family of three one month and a half!
customer_reviews.text: I love buying in bulk. This particular detergent is one of my favorites because of the smell. It lasted my family a while (one month and a half). I plan to purchase this again in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Shipping mistake!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, though it was leaking into the box on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: hal rose

customer_reviews.title: I have used Gain for years and I love it. It is the way the product was ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not the product I am rating. I have used Gain for years and I love it. It is the way the product was delivered. There was very little packing material in the box causing the product's measuring cap to.come off and the product to leak. The box was also coming apart at the seams, not good.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Great puchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this product works great , makes my clothes smell real nice , real good laundry detergent , would definitely recommend this product to family and friends
customer_reviews.author: akowall42

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!
customer_reviews.text: The best smelling detergent on the earth! I love this stuff!! The original scent is the best! Make sure to use the Gain dryer sheets and the Gain fabric softener to maintain that original smell.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Martin

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Favors laundry soap, great smell, great price, lasts a good while
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Martin

customer_reviews.title: Soap
customer_reviews.text: Receive promptly I have ordered several times will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent on clothes but even better with the scent booster
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Gain laundry detergent liquid
customer_reviews.text: Gain liquid detergent in plastic container work good and smell good .
customer_reviews.author: Tim kirby

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: We have a dog sanctuary so we do a lot of laundry. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela m McElroym

product_meta.title: Gain High Efficiency Original Liquid Laundry Detergent, 146 Loads , Green
product_meta.description: Gain He High Efficiency Original Liquid Laundry Detergent, 225 oz
feature_bullets: Original scent combines these sniff-tastic elements
Blossoms with a modern Fruity, Green twist
